summary: The diff successfully implements both requirements. REQ-1 is satisfied through backend migration adding the new UPI ID '9392412728-2@axl' and a backend method to retrieve it. REQ-2 is satisfied through frontend masking implementation that displays only partial UPI digits (first 5 characters + asterisks) while maintaining full payment functionality.

hallucinated_features.description: Added bank account number and IFSC code fields to backend state
hallucinated_features.reason: The migration.mo file introduces 'bankAccountNumber' and 'ifscCode' fields with values '122002023499' and 'ICIC000TRF' respectively, which were not requested in the BuildRequest
